about_the_game:
"This is going to be bigger than 2008..."

It's a gloomy night on September 15th, 2025. You start the night shift as a security guard at Ellingby House, London. The once pristine head office of J.R Holder & Sons now suffers from repeated intrusions, neglect, and all the signs of corporate mismanagement. The building should be empty due to much needed renovations, but something is not quite right upon your arrival...

"Many today are waking up to their computers locked..."

The news gets worse every day. A ransomware trojan is infecting computers globally, a major scandal is erupting in Westminster, and nationwide protests are now a regular occurrence.

Gameplay:

Ellingby House is a first person point-and-click puzzle adventure. You'll explore the building by navigating between high resolution pre-rendered 360° panoramas, picking up and inspecting items, and interacting with mechanisms and computers.

Special Requirements:

We recommend playing Ellingby House on a desktop PC or laptop with a 16:9 screen. Other aspect ratios will work though with some pillarboxing / letterboxing. Please make sure you have graphics hardware supporting OpenGL 4.4 or later. Ellingby House makes use of sound and colour in some puzzles and may not be suitable for those with hearing impairments or colour blindness.

name: Ellingby House

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 or later
  • Processor: 64-Bit Dual-Core 2.0 GHz or better, AVX support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: At least 2GB VRAM, OpenGL 4.4 or later
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We recommend playing on a 16:9 FullHD capable screen at a resolution of 1920x1080. Other resolutions are possible but will introduce letterboxing/pillarboxing to accommodate.

short_description: Corporate collapse, financial crisis, a ransomware plague... and you have become trapped! The crumbling head office of J.R Holder & Sons will ensnare you in a mystery. Interact and navigate between rich, detailed 360° panoramas, while using items to uncover the story in Ellingby House.
